items.name: Right Bottom Image with Testimony
items.challenges: The Last Great Time War. My people fought a race called the Daleks, for the sake of all creation. And they lost. We lost. Everyone lost. They're all gone now. My family. My friends.
items.solution: vPeople assume that time is a strict progression of cause-and-effect... but actually, from a non-linear, non-subjective viewpoint, it's more like a big ball of wibbly-wobbly... timey-wimey... stuff.

testimonial.name: The 10th Dr
testimonial.quote: Blimey, trying to make an Ood laugh... I'll tell you what, then: don't...step on any butterflies. What have butterflies ever done to you? I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. Allons-y!

technology: I often type with a keyboard

items.name: Center Animation
items.description: project.media.animation You can pass in a macbook in animation.frame or iPad
items.challenges: The trouble with computers, of course, is that they're very sophisticated idiots. They do exactly what you tell them at amazing speed. Even if you order them to kill you.
items.solution: So if you do happen to change your mind, it's very difficult to stop them from obeying the original order. But not impossible.

items.name: Multiple Classes
items.role: No Image, Display Testimony and Two Col for All
items.challenges: Create a two column section without an image and a right aligned testimony.

testimonial.name: The 11th Doctor
testimonial.quote: Oh, I always rip out the last page of a book. Then it doesn't have to end. I hate endings!

items.name: Image Left
items.challenges: Image is on left placed in the center of the div. No testimonial on this example.
items.solution: So if you do happen to change your mind, it's very difficult to stop them from obeying the original order. But not impossible.

testimonial.name: The 12th Doctor
testimonial.quote: I'm Scottish. I can complain about things now. I can really complain about things now.
